channel.title: FAM Thread 1 (Day 1)
channel.description:
# [color=ffc60a]Welcome to FoL's Annual Mash![/color] Hosted by @Chloe, @DatBird, @Geyde, @Arete, and @osieorb18 Host account: @FoLAnnualMash Big thanks to Marl and Firekitten for their moral support.
## [color=ffe296]Rules[/color] Follow the [Global Forum Rules](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244) as well as the [Forum Game Rules](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/official-forum-game-rules/78926) Flavorclaiming is not allowed. More information can be found farther down. ## [color=ffe296]What is FAM?[/color] All roles are custom-made, and will be designed based on the players who join the game. You may even get lucky and roll yourself! Everybody will have one or more ability/passive; *nobody will be vanilla.* This game will feature In-Thread-Attacks (ITAs). Along with this, there will be events in which you can earn prizes (or death)! There will be at least two factions - Town and Mafia. Third-party roles (neutrals) may exist. ## [color=ffe296]Voting[/color] * Both majority and plurality are in effect. * All votes must be in the form of `**/vote [player]**` to be considered valid, and all unvotes must be in the form `**/unvote**`. After voting in the main thread, send a link to the post in which you voted in the voting thread, or will not be counted. * You may self-vote. Along with this, no-elimination is a valid vote, and may be hammered to end the day early. In cases where no-elim and another vote are tied at the end of the day, no-elim will have priority in the rand. * Tied votes will result in a player being eliminated at random from among the tied players. * MyLo (mis-eliminate and lose) and LyLo (eliminate or lose) will not be announced, and votes will not be locked. ## [color=ffe296]Gameplay[/color] * Days are 36 hours and nights are 12 hours. In the instance the day ends early due to majority, the Night phase will be extended to begin at a consistent time. * Deadline to submit Night actions is 2 hours before Night ends. * Deadline to submit Day actions is 1 hour before Day ends, unless specified otherwise. * Barring the potential existence of janitors, flips will always be true. Rolecards will not be fake. Conversion does not exist. Game-ending jesters do not exist. * Other than the above, everything is on the table (: * We will be following [Natural Action Resolution](https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Natural_Action_Resolution). If there are any major issues with NAR, [Reasonable Action Resolution](https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Reasonable_Action_Resolution) may be utilized. (We don't expect this to occur) * Should the main thread reach 9k posts, a new thread will be created. ## [color=ffe296]ITAs[/color] * Every day starting Day 2, there will be a single ITA window that begins 6 hours after SoD, and ends 6 hours before EoD. During this period, you may submit an ITA by typing some variety of `**/ITA [player]**` and pinging the host account: @FoLAnnualMash * ITAs have a base accuracy of 10% * Do not attempt to ITA if you are out of shots. If you shoot a dead player, your shot will be refunded * If a player is protected from an ITA, the feedback will be 'Hit! Nobody died.' Otherwise the feedback will be a death, or 'Miss!' * ITAs will be disabled after a certain point. This will be whenever the hosts deem fit. ## [color=ffe296]Rolecards and Flavor[/color] ### Example Rolecard >
> > > **Chloe** > *'its not fucking o???'* > [color=green]**Town Idiot**[/color] >
> > **Expert of Forum Mofoa:** All instances of the letter *i* that you post in the thread must be replaced with the letter *o*. To bypass this restriction, you may post freely as long as you include an image of a cat within your post. > > *Eliminate the Mafia and all other possible threats to the Town.* The user is **Chloe**, the role name is [color=green]**Town Idiot**[/color], and the flavor is *'it's not fucking o???'* as well as 'Expert of Forum Mofoa.'
# [color=darkred]**DO NOT FLAVORCLAIM OR PARAPHRASE FLAVOR. YOU MAY ONLY CLAIM YOUR USER AND ROLE**[/color]
**Do not claim or paraphrase any quotes or flavor within your rolecard. Do not claim the name of your abilities or passives. You may paraphrase what your passives or abilities *do*, but may not repeat the text word-for-word.** The alignment of any User will be entirely random. Attempting to solve the game based on flavor is useless. ### Standard Win Conditions [color=green]**Town**[/color] is the uninformed majority. Their win condition is: *Eliminate the Mafia and all other possible threats to the Town.* [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] is the informed minority. Their win condition is: *You win the game if no more threats to the Mafia exist or nothing can prevent that from happening.* Other win conditions may or may not exist. --- # Players 1. @Blizer 3. @Icibalus 4. @Mistyx 5. @Aelin 6. @KyoDaz 7. @Intensify 8. @Marshal 9. @Marluxion 10. @Solic 11. @sulit 12. @min 13. @PokemonKidRyan 14. @Amelia 15. @Nightingale 16. @Vulgard 17. @SirDerpsAlot 18. @Lemonfairy 19. @TrustworthyLiberal 20. @Wazza 21. @Centuries 22. @Joker 23. @WindwardAway 24. @Italy 25. @clonedcheese 26. @Arctic 27. @Whysper 28. @Silviu200530 30. @Jane 31. @Gghana 32. @katze 33. @Emilia 34. @Luxy 35. @Appelsiini 37. @Ami -> @Esooa 38. @Hippolytus 39. @Frostwolf103 40. @astand -> @lol 41. @an_gorta_pratai 42. @TheLukundo 43. @Universal 44. @Psyx -> @Leafia 45. @MaximusPrime 45. @nutella 46. @orangeandblack5 # Dead Players 1. @eevee - Modkilled Day 1 - [color=green]**Italy: Town Godfather**[/color] 2. @Firekitten - Died Day 1 - [color=green]**Marluxion: Town Tunneler**[/color] 3. @Tangeld - Eliminated Day 1 - [color=cyan]**TheLukundo: Imperial Passive JOAT**[/color] [details=Replacements] 1. thepigeonnyc 2. ATNoName 3. EliThePsycho 4. Blitz [/details] [details=Spectators] 1. Alice 2. Prophylaxis 3. Nerbins 4. 5. [/details] ## [color=ffe296]Threadmarks[/color] [u]****Day 1****[/u] [**Event Announcement: Avatars**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/339?u=communityfm3) / [Voting](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/5130?u=communityfm3) [**Event Announcement: 1610**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/1615?u=communityfm3) [**Event Announcement: Math Is Fun!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/3200?u=chloe) [**Event Announcement: Skribblio**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/3703) [**Substitution: lol replaces astand**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/5265?u=communityfm3) [**Substitution: Esooa replaces Ami**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/5652?u=communityfm3) [**Substitution: Leafia replaces Psyx**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/5821?u=communityfm3) [**Eevee is modkilled**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-1-46-47/88118/5903?u=chloe) - [color=green]**Italy: Town Godfather**[/color] [**Event Announcement: Surprising Details**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-1-46-47/88118/5700?u=chloe) [**Firekitten dies!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-1-46-47/88118/6059?u=folannualmash) - [color=green]**Marluxion: Town Tunneler**[/color] [**EoD1: Tangeld is eliminated!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-night-1-44-47/88118/8490?u=chloe) - [color=cyan]**TheLukundo: Imperial Passive JOAT**[/color] ### [u]****Day 2****[/u] - [**DAY 2 THREAD**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-night-1-44-47/88190?u=folannualmash) [**SoD2: Marshal, Nightingale, and Wazza died in the night! Two NPCs have appeared!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-39-47/88190/5?u=arete) [**Event Announcement: RopeStringFace's Return**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-39-47/88190/98?u=arete) [**Event Announcement: Throne of Lies: Medieval Politics**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-39-47/88190/1273?u=arete) [**sulit dies!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-39-47/88190/1861?u=arete) - **[color = green]Appelsiini, Town ITA Nerfer[/color]** [**lol is shot in ITAs!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-39-47/88190/1952?u=arete) - **[color = red]Joker, Mafia Suspicious Peddler[/color]** [**Intensify is shot in ITAs!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-39-47/88190/2457?u=folannualmash) - **No flip** [**TheLukundo is shot in ITAs!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-37-47/88190/2913?u=arete) - **[color = red]Jane, Mafia Spectator[/color]** [**A shot rings out! Nobody has died!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-thread-2-day-2/88190/2935?u=folannualmash) [**MaximusPrime is shot in ITAs!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-36-47/88190/3281?u=folannualmash) - [color=green]**Mistyx: Town Support JOAT**[/color] [**Intensify flips!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-thread-2-day-2/88190/4830?u=folannualmash) - [color=green]**an_gorta_pratai: Town Tree**[/color] [**Substitution: EliThePsycho replaces SirDerpsAlot**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-36-47/88190/5386?u=folannualmash) [**Boat Explosion Kills Six: Amelia, Hippo, Leafia, icibalus, KyoDaz, Joker**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-30-47/88190/5759?u=folannualmash) [**Min is shot in ITAs!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-30-47/88190/6107?u=folannualmash) - [color=green]**ArcticXI: Town Ransomer**[/color] [**Only Whysper and Marluxion may be voted. Votes are reset.**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-29-47/88190/6935) [**EoD2: Whysper is eliminated and Silviu dies!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-night-2-27-47/88190/7447?u=folannualmash) ### ****[u]Day 3[/u]**** - [**DAY 3 THREAD**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-thread-3-day-3/88199?u=chloe) [**SoD3: Aelin and EliThePsycho died during the night!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-3-25-47/88199/3?u=chloe) [**Event Announcement: Storytime**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-3-24-47/88199/14?u=chloe) [**Marluxion dies!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-3-24-47/88199/168?u=chloe) - [color=green]**Firekitten: Town Spankvig**[/color] [**nutella is shot in ITAs!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-3-23-47/88199/1764?u=datbird) - [color=red]**orangeandblack5: Mafia Solar Car Cult Leader**[/color] [**Uni is shot in ITAs**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-3-22-47/88199/2207) - [color=green]**Solic: Town Time Reaper**[/color] [**EoD3: Appelsiini is eliminated!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-night-3-21-47/88199/6095?u=folannualmash) - [color=green]**sulit: Town Strongman**[/color] ### ****[u]Day 4[/u]**** - [****DAY 4/5/6 THREAD****](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-final-main-thread-game-over-mafia-imperials-win/88209?u=chloe) [**SoD4: Esooa, PKR, and ArcticXI died during the night!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-18-47/88209/4?u=chloe) [**Vulgard dies!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-17-47/88209/410?u=chloe) - [color=green]**Silviu200530: Town Ape Gorilla**[/color] [**Luxy dies!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-16-47/88209/674?u=folannualmash) - [color=green]**GGhana: Town Clown**[/color] [**WindwardAway is shot in ITAs and TrustworthyLiberal wins!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-12-47/88209/1334?u=chloe) [**Jane is shot in ITAs!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-12-47/88209/1348?u=chloe) - [color=red]**Universal: Mafia Enabler**[/color] [**Centuries is shot in ITAs!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-12-47/88209/1491?u=chloe) - [color=red]**osieorb18: Mafia Sensei**[/color] [**EoD4: Gorta is eliminated!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-12-47/88209/2606?u=folannualmash) - [color=red]**Lemonfairy: Mafia Sheepherder**[/color] ### ****[u]Day 5[/u]**** [**SOD5: Blizer Died during the night**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-5-10-47/88209/2617) - [color=green]**Clonedcheese: Town Chronomancer**[/color] [**EoD5: Emilia Executed**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-6-6-47/88209/4161?u=datbird) - [color=green]**Aelin: Town Neighborhood Strategist**[/color] ### ****[u]Day 6[/u]**** [**SOD6: Lemon, Mistyx, and Italy all Died during the night**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-6-6-47/88209/4164?u=datbird) [**GAME END - Frostwolf is eliminated!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-game-over-mafia-imperials-win/88209/4954?u=chloe) ### [**Voting Thread**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-voting-thread/88117?u=folannualmash) ### [**ITA Thread**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-itaing-thread/88191?u=folannualmash)

ITA window adjustments will be determined by start of day.

item.title: FAM Thread 1 (Day 1)
item.dc:creator: FoLAnnualMash
item.description:
Polls!

Please vote in your rolecard.

  • Would you like to create an ITA thread, similar to the voting thread, to aid in ITA processing? This will be implemented if more than 50 percent of living players vote in favor of it.
  • Would you like to switch to 12/12 or 24/24 phases after this night, or stay at 36/12? Please vote for all options you are okay with. If the game switches to 24/24, both phase changes will happen at the current SoD time. This will only happen if at least 75 percent of players vote in favor of it.
  • Do you want a new main thread at the start of Day 2, or to wait until this thread reaches 9000 posts? A new main thread will be created immediately if more than 50 percent of voters vote in favor of it.

Read full topic

Day 2 will end at the usual time. ITA window modifications, if applicable, will be announced near the start of the day.

Read full topic

item.title: FAM Thread 1 (Day 1)
item.dc:creator: FoLAnnualMash
item.description:
EVENT ANNOUNCEMENT

SHEEP

Unlimited participants. No chance of death.

What is SHEEP?:
Players privately submit answers to a series of questions. You receive one point for each player who answers a given question the same way as you (different spellings of the same answer, such as “FoL” and “Forum of Lies” may be combined).

Results will published at the beginning of Day 2, and answers will be anonymous.

Remember, the objective is to answer in the way you think will be most similar to other players’ answers!

How to participate:
Submit answers to the following questions in your rolecard. Your answers are due by the action deadline.

Questions
  1. What is your alignment?
  2. Which player in this game do you most enjoy playing with?
  3. If you could kill one player in the game, who would it be?
  4. Which host is the coolest?
  5. Which game on FoL was the best?
  6. Which FoL class is your favorite? (A list can be found here.)
  7. What is your favorite role to play?
  8. What role were you hoping to rand in this game?
  9. What flavor were you hoping to rand in this game?
  10. Are you having fun?

You may not talk (or hint) about what may be happening in ongoing events in ANY non-event chats.

Read full topic

item.title: FAM Thread 1 (Day 1)
item.dc:creator: FoLAnnualMash
item.description:
EoD1 Flavor

Flavor writer’s disclaimer: Player names used in the flavor other than the wagon-ee are determined by votes on the player, and have no relation to role, alignment, or their actual reasons for voting the player. Attempting to make reads based on the flavor (which, again, is NAI) is angleshooting.

June 19, 2021

Arete
hey so
you know how apparently
when you die in the simulation
you die in real life
(seriously, this is the dumbest possible way for your simulation to work. why is that a thing)

Datbird
Hey now. Lets be nice.

Chloe
okok
what’s up, nerd

Arete
well apparently Firekitten died?
or maybe Marl
I’m not totally clear
Firekitten the person but Marl the avatar?

Chloe
The only thing that matters to the simulation is who’s controlling the avatar, so Firekitten died.

Geyde
I don’t want to sound like a consequentialist here but you are aware that people dying is bad, right?

Chloe
i’m not stupid! it’s not my foult they hacked the simulation to use that option

Arete
foult

Geyde
Francis please shut up

osieorb18
Why did you design the simulation to have that option in the first place?

Chloe
It seemed like a good idea at the time!

Arete
literally how

Datbird
Guys, stop fighting
the rest of the community members are doing something

Marluxion
i think Tangeld is a hacker

Tangeld
I’m not, I swear! I love FoL!

katze
Oh yeah? You love FoL? Name every FoL class.

Tangeld
Cult Leader
Paladin

katze
That’s two of them. Keep going.

Tangeld
Um … Bodyguard? Medium? Jailor?

WindwardAway
Wait a minute! Those are Town of Salem classes!
BOOM BYE SCUM!

Tangeld
Wait, I’m not from here, but that doesn’t mean I’m a hacker! I’m here for totally unrelated reasons, I promise!

WindwardAway
Sounds like something a HACKER would say. System, disconnect @Tangeld!

System Message: Disconnecting Tangeld...
System Message: Tangeld has been disconnected. Terminating subject.
System Message: Tangeld was: The Lukundo, Imperial Passive JoaT.

Arete
so they literally just murdered someone

Chloe
Does it matter? They’re not even from FoL.

osieorb18
I’m not from FoL either, Chloe.

Chloe
MC is close enough. Or whatever anime site you were from originally. I mean, have you seen my PFP?

System Message: ATTENTION ALL USERS. THIS IS A TEST OF THE EMERGENCY BROADCASTING SYSTEM. Please proceed to your designated staging location and await further instructions. Estimated duration of test: 12 hours.

System Message: ATTENTION ALL USERS. THIS IS A TEST OF THE EMERGENCY BROADCASTING SYSTEM. Please proceed to your designated staging location and await further instructions. Estimated duration of test: 12 hours.

System Message: ATTENTION ALL USERS. THIS IS A TEST OF THE EMERGENCY BROADCASTING SYSTEM. Please proceed to your designated staging location and await further instructions. Estimated duration of test: 12 hours.

DatBird
Whats that mean?

Chloe
It means you’d better go to your staging location, Dat. Unless you want to end the same way as Tangeld?

Read full topic

item.title: FAM Thread 1 (Day 1)
item.dc:creator: FoLAnnualMash
item.description:
not me putting flavor in the wrong thread

Tangeld has been executed. She was:

TheLukundo
‘I legit don’t know how to play checkers’
Imperial Passive JOAT

Mass Heresy (Passive): The Queen has sent you to Adiart alongside your partner, [REDACTED], in order to save the kingdom from widespread cult brainwashing. By killing those in charge of this blasphemy, Adiart will return back to its rightful place. To aid in accomplishing this mission, you and your partner have access to a factional chat and some factional abilities (described in the chat).

You wot m8? (Day, 2-Shot): Twice per game, as a Day action, determine if a player is a Cult Leader. You will receive the result at the start of the Night phase.

Changing of the Guard (Passive): When you die, your partner will gain two shots of ‘You wot m8?’

Crown Jewels (Night): Each Night, as a Night action, you may choose to apply one of Godfather, Strongwilled + Ninja, or 1-shot Bulletproof to yourself. If a kill attempt is blocked by the 1-shot Bulletproof, you will no longer be able to choose that option during this game.

You win and leave the game if the Imperial faction kills two Cult Leaders or nothing can prevent that from happening. You lose and leave the game if it is impossible to do so.

Read full topic
